class.name: minestar.production.domain.drawpoint.DrawPointTimeLineRecord
class.meta: A historical record of when the operating status of a draw point changed.

many-to-one.name: drawPoint
many-to-one.meta: A reference to the draw point (MSMODEL.DRAW_POINT) that this record applies to.

property.name: status
property.meta: The reason of the operating status that the draw point changed to.

property.name: statusDrawPointOID
property.meta: The OID of the operating status that the draw point changed to.

property.name: statusAreaOID
property.meta: The OID of the operating status that the panel changed to.

property.name: hungUp
property.meta: Whether the new operating status represents a hung up draw point. (This flag is '1' if it represents a hung up draw point and '0' if it does not.)

property.name: drawPointClosed
property.meta: Whether the new operating status represents a temporarily closed draw point. (This flag is '1' if it represents a temporarily closed draw point and '0' if it does not.)

property.name: areaClosed
property.meta: Whether the current status of the panel that the draw point belong to is closed or not. (This flag is '1' if it represents a closed panel and '0' if it does not.)

property.name: oldStatus
property.meta: The reason of the operating status that the draw point changed from.

property.name: oldDrawPointStatusOID
property.meta: The OID of the operating status that the draw point changed from.

property.name: oldAreaStatusOID
property.meta: The OID of the operating status that the panel changed from.

property.name: oldHungUp
property.meta: Whether the previous operating status represents a hung up draw point. (This flag is '1' if it represents a hung up draw point and '0' if it does not.)

property.name: oldDrawPointClosed
property.meta: Whether the previous operating status represents a temporarily closed draw point. (This flag is '1' if it represents a temporarily closed draw point and '0' if it does not.)

property.name: oldAreaClosed
property.meta: Whether the previous status of the panel that the draw point belong to is closed or not. (This flag is '1' if it represents a closed panel and '0' if it does not.)

property.name: changeDate
property.meta: The timestamp of when the draw point's operating status change occurred.
The UTC timestamp of when the draw point's operating status change occurred.
